clause.title: Try-catch-finally statements
clause.paragraph: Definite assignment analysis for a try-catch-finally statement of the form: try try-block catch(...) catch-block-1 ... catch(...) catch-block-n finally finally-block is done as if the statement were a try-finally statement enclosing a try-catch statement: try { try try-block catch(...) catch-block-1 ... catch(...) catch-block-n } finally finally-block
